Text: You can hate Nirvana for being sell-outs, but one thing they did is absolutely admirable: Their music killed hair metal for good (just look at the timeline in this collection).
B,Can you please seed hair metal 3?
1991 was the release of Nevermind - only very few hair metal combos survived the blast of that impact.

Well TEN released in 1991...

I think Grunge,in general, broke Hair Metal...Not just Nirvana...
